el:english.el:comment: Difficult to translate. If you have no idea, just say: Why on this side does this message sit? The Reaper has a use for it

el:string.el:english: No hint today ... Those flagstones pass away ... The docu stands alone ... Why is it so alone? -- This hint today ... Why is it on this side ... The reaper passing by ... Could know the reason why! (orig. by Herman's Hermits)
el:string.el:translation: Warum ist der Hinweis auf dieser Seite? Sollte der Mäher das vielleicht wissen?
